data.name: evidence_of_equivalent_standards_check_site_for_conditions_title
data.value: Evidence of equivalent standards - Check site fulfils conditions

data.name: check_site_fulfills_these_conditions
data.value: Check this site fulfils these conditions

data.name: packaging_waste_separated_at_source_to_ensure_shipment_of_similar_materials_or_grades
data.value: The packaging waste is separated at source, or processed, to ensure it is exported for reprocessing within a shipment of similar material - for example, if the shipment contains steel drink cans and steel scrap and is not a general mix of different materials (such as paper and plastic), or a mixture of different grades of the same material (for example, different plastic polymers)

data.name: consignments_meet_well_established_international_technical_specification_for_exported_waste_material
data.value: There is a well-established international technical specification for the exported packaging waste material that your consignments meet

data.name: material_needs_limited_processing_overseas_and_recycling_has_losses_meeting_EU_standards
data.value: The material needs only limited processing overseas before it is recovered, and the recycling process has losses that meet EU industry standards

data.name: processing_waste_material_before_recycling_does_not_include_hand_sorting
data.value: Processing the waste material before recycling does not include hand-sorting that may cause significant harm to human health

data.name: material_does_through_recognised_recycling_unlikely_to_cause_significant_harm_to_environment
data.value: The material goes through a recognised form of recycling, and is unlikely to cause significant harm to the environment.

data.name: yes_they_fulfill_these_conditions_dont_want_to_upload_evidence_of_equivalent_standards
data.value: Yes, they fulfil all the conditions. I do not want to upload evidence of broadly equivalent standards

data.name: no_need_to_upload_evidence_but_must_have_documents_showing_conditions_fulfilled
data.value: You do not need to upload evidence. However, you must have documents to show they fulfil these conditions

data.name: yes_they_fulfill_these_conditions_I_want_to_upload_evidence_of_equivalent_standards
data.value: Yes, they fulfil all the conditions. I also want to upload evidence of broadly equivalent standards

data.name: no_they_dont_fulfill_these_conditions
data.value: No, they do not fulfil all the conditions

data.name: you_must_upload_evidence_of_equivalent_stanards
data.value: You must upload evidence of broadly equivalent standards

data.name: selection_error_message
data.value: Select yes if the site fulfils all the conditions
